result.arabic_text: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱغۡفِرۡ لِي وَلِأَخِي وَأَدۡخِلۡنَا فِي رَحۡمَتِكَۖ وَأَنتَ أَرۡحَمُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ
result.translation: Musa amaze gutahura uko vyagenze, yavuze ati: “Mana yanje Rurema Allah! Mbabarira itwarwa ryanje n’agashavu, Wongere Ubabarire murumunanje ivyamushikiye, Unadushire twempi mu mpuhwe zawe. Burya Wewe ni We Urangwa n’impuhwe kurusha abagirampuhwe bose”.
